properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
SIERRA LEONE.
NINE PERSONS FROM F/V YUFENG 102 ABANDONED SHIP IN
LIFEBOAT VICINITY 07-31N 015-08W. VESSELS IN VICINITY
REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO MRCC MONROVIA, PHONE: 2317 7709 2229,
2317 7729 0158, E-MAIL: MRMRCC@LIMA-LIBERIA.COM.
